subject: Relationships
title: Online Dating: The New Normal
description: One-minute skill: Online Dating: The New Normal.

hook.text: In 1995, meeting online was embarrassing. By 2023, it's how most couples meet. Stigma evaporated.

buildup.text: Match.com launched in 1995. Tinder arrived in 2012. Within a decade, swiping replaced approaching.

discovery.text: Today, 40% of US couples meet online â€” more than through friends, work, or any other method.

twist.text: Online dating didn't just add an option. It replaced the entire social infrastructure of meeting people.

climax.text: The smartphone became the world's most powerful matchmaker. Love moved from chance to algorithm.

punchline.text: Meeting online went from shameful to standard in one generation.
